amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 108-446 and numbered 4 as modified was offered as the Democratic substitute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-446 to balance the budget by FY 2012 and to establish the pay- as-you-go (PAYGO) point of order in House rules that could be raised against any tax cuts or spending increases that are not offset.
